attributes.action: to investigate the massive difference between petrol and diesel prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before the run on oil in the summer of 2008 the difference between petrol and diesel was 2p per litre.  Now it is a massive 14p per litre.  Where as in most of europe the difference is a couple of cents and in the majority diesel is cheaper.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
